title: Trumpland Ramps Up Attacks On Netflix Warner Brothers Merger To Help Larry Ellison
full_text: Trumpland Ramps Up Attacks On Netflix Warner Brothers Merger To Help Larry Ellison. So we’ve been noting how the Trump administration has been helping Larry Ellison wage war on Netflix’s proposed merger with Warner Brothers.
